content.event: Serverless Workers: Building a Runtime Abstraction for AWS Lambda
content.description: Jacob Griswold-Moran (Tech Lead @ HealthVerity), speaks about his experience writing a runtime abstraction for Lambda functions that enables worry-free compatibility with multiple AWS event sources, as well as some of the successes and pain points in developing and maintaining the resulting library.

content.event: Prototipado rápido con AWS Amplify
content.description: En este meetup, Nader Dabit hablará sobre algunas de las herramientas disponibles en la actualidad que ha construido y desarrollado con su equipo en AWS, y nos demostrará en una sesión de codificación en vivo, cómo construir una aplicación de streaming de pila completa.
content.organizer: AWS User Group Ciudad de México

content.event: 3 hours of Serverless
content.description: Come watch 5 of the top cloud experts talk about the future of Serverless. Featuring Jeremy Daly, Rodric Rabbah, Rob Allen, Srushith Repakula, and Arjun Guha.

content.event: Real-Time Serverless Apps with .NET, Azure Functions and Azure SignalR
content.description: In this talk, long-time MVP and MS Regional Director Rainer Stropek demonstrates the combination of Azure SignalR with Azure Functions based on an end-to-end sample. Be prepared for a session with no slides, just coding.

content.event: AWS Lambda and Serverless framework
content.description: In this talk, we will explore the AWS Serverless framework. Serverless architecture is a way to build and run applications and services without having to manage infrastructure. You’ll learn Serverless Computing from beginning to end. We will take a deep dive into best practices, core features, and advanced features including step functions.

content.event: Apps Serverless y alternativas en Azure
content.description: En esta serie de Meetups estaremos enfocados en el diseño y desarrollo de soluciones Serverless utilizando el ecositema de .NET y Azure para crear aplicaciones basadas en eventos, altamente performantes, autoescalables y distribuidas.

content.event: Taking Serverless to the next level
content.description: Moving to serverless brings more benefits if you can optimize the way you work. In this session, I share best practices on different areas, from infrastructure management to deployments, distributed architectures and the role of teams, focusing on people and processes that are at the core of software development.

content.event: Going Serverless with Java - Real life learnings
content.description: In this talk I want to take you through what we learned. We will see how to get going, how to think about designing your services (hint: DDD), which AWS services to consider, how to deploy, test, monitor & debug it. And then of course all the interesting tips and tricks you don’t find in the documentation, like how to define your API using Swagger, how to keep secrets safe, ...

content.event: Developing scalable enterprise serverless applications on Azure with .NET
content.description: In this session, Callon will talk about developing scalable enterprise serverless applications on Azure with .NET and use a real world example of a solution he developed and running in production.

content.event: Serverless Hotdog Detection - JavaScript Meetup
content.description: A scrumptious crash-course through Amazon Web Services and the Serverless Framework!

content.event: Serverless GraphQL Authentication + Authorization using Dgraph & Auth0
content.description: If you are interested in learning more about Dgraph's GraphQL authorization, integration with Auth0, or want to implement a completely serverless authentication + authorizaton combo, then this talk is for you.

content.event: Stateful Function-as-a-Service
content.description: Asterios will start the evening with an introduction to the topic explaining the rise, current state (...) and challenges of the Function-as-a-Service (FaaS) programming paradigm. Following that, Viktor and Stephan will introduce their respective approaches to solving these challenges.

content.event: Serverless Applications on AWS
content.description: Come learn about building serverless applications on AWS. AWS Lambda, Amazon API Gateway and other AWS Serverless Services will be covered. End to end - App Demo (Using C#).

content.event: Webinar: Going Serverless
content.description:
Over the last couple of years, with the rapid rise of microservices, serverless architecture has started gaining immense popularity.
The Serverless framework helps software systems achieve high scalability and high availability; which are *must have* qualities for any software system these days.

content.event: 25% de desconto: Serverless + Azure Functions na Prática #3
content.description: A adoção de arquiteturas serverless vem ganhando cada vez mais força em projetos de software nos mais variados cenários, com o baixo custo de alternativas como Azure Functions favorecendo em muito esta prática. A possibilidade de se preocupar menos com questões de infraestrutura e mais na entrega de soluções também constitui um fator importante e que merece ser destacado em tais casos.

content.event: Serverless War Stories: Running a ticketing platform for less than $2 a month
content.description: Running a ticketing platform comes with its own challenges, going serverless sometimes increases it. All the way from choosing the programming language to considering the cold starts, things become a little complicated. This talk will cover a wide range of topics covering the various architectural design decisions, trade offs, pros, and cons.

content.event: COURSE: Production Ready Serverless taught by Yan Cui, €880
content.description: Start with an intro to Lambda, moving onto API security, testing strategies, CI/CD, secret management, and operational best practices for monitoring & troubleshooting.

content.event: ServerlessDays Warsaw
content.description: ServerlessDays Warsaw is a 1-day conference about Serverless technologies with a full day of talks.

content.event: ServerlessDays ANZ
content.description: We are combining the 2020 ANZ serverless community events under the ServerlessDays ANZ banner and host speakers from the Serverless community right around the world.
content.organizer: ServerlessDays Sydney, Melbourne, Perth and Auckland

content.event: COURSE: Advanced React taught by Simona Cotin & Artur Daschevici, €440
content.description: This course gives a good basis for building a React Application with an associated design system. At the end you will have a highly reusable boilerplate for building a scalable component ecosystem.

content.event: Webinar: Debugging Slow Lambda Response Times
content.description: In this webinar, we will show you how to quickly identify and debug latency problems due to 3rd-party services, and some best practices for dealing with poor performing 3rd party services.

content.event: CDK Day
content.description: More than a year has passed since AWS CDK went GA and it has grown into a family of products (AWS CDK, CDKTF, CDK8s). Let’s take one day and talk Serverless and multi cloud all in CDK

content.event: ServerlessDays Hamburg
content.description: ServerlessDays Hamburg is a 2-day conference about Serverless technologies with one day of workshops and one day with talks.

content.event: Serverless Architecture Conference
content.description: We bring together the world’s leading software architects and cloud experts to share their ideas and knowledge.
